name: eclecticiq
label: EclecticIQ
description: EclecticIQ is a global threat intelligence, hunting and response technology provider. This connector facilitates the automated operations like get IP reputation, get domain reputation, get file reputation etc.

fields.title: EclecticIQ Platform URL
fields.name: eiq_url
fields.tooltip: IP address or FQDN of the EclecticIQ Platform.
fields.description: IP address or FQDN of the EclecticIQ Platform to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: eiq_user
fields.tooltip: Username to authorize in EclecticIQ Platform.
fields.description: Username to access the EclecticIQ platform to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: eiq_password
fields.tooltip: Password to access the EclecticIQ platform to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Group Name
fields.name: eiq_group
fields.tooltip: Group Name to create Sightings in EclecticIQ Platform. Case sensitive.
fields.description: Name of the group that you will use to create 'Sightings' in the EclecticIQ Platform. Note: The group name is case-sensitive.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get IP Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves the reputation of the specified IP address from the EclecticIQ Platform.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: observable
parameters.description: IP address that you want to hunt in the EclecticIQ Platform and whose reputation you want to retrieve from the EclecticIQ Platform.

operations.title: Get Domain Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves the reputation of the specified domain name from the EclecticIQ Platform.

parameters.title: Domain
parameters.name: observable
parameters.description: Name of the domain that you want to hunt in the EclecticIQ Platform and whose reputation you want to retrieve from the EclecticIQ Platform.

operations.title: Get Email Reputation
operations.description: Email address that you want to hunt in the EclecticIQ Platform and whose reputation you want to retrieve from the EclecticIQ Platform.

parameters.title: Email
parameters.name: observable
parameters.description: Specify Email value for the reputation hunt.

operations.title: Get Filename or Hash Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves the reputation of the specified file name of hash from the EclecticIQ Platform.

parameters.title: Filename or Hash
parameters.name: observable
parameters.description: File name or file hash value that you want to hunt in the EclecticIQ Platform and whose reputation you want to retrieve from the EclecticIQ Platform.

operations.title: Get URL Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves the reputation of the specified URL from the EclecticIQ Platform.

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: observable
parameters.description: URL value that you want to hunt in the EclecticIQ Platform and whose reputation you want to retrieve from the EclecticIQ Platform.

operations.title: Query Entities
operations.description: Queries EclecticIQ Platform for entities based on the entity type and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Search Observable
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: (Optional) Observable value that you want to use to query related entities in the EclecticIQ platform.

parameters.title: Search Text into Entities Title
parameters.name: entity_value
parameters.tooltip: To find exact phrase wrap it with double-quotes (\")
parameters.description: (Optional)Text that you want to search in the title of the entity. To find the exact phrase wrap it within double-quotes (\").

parameters.title: Entity Type to Query
parameters.name: entity_type
parameters.description: Choose the type of entity that you want to query in the EclecticIQ platform. You can choose from entity types such as: all, campaign, incident, ttp, etc.

operations.title: Create Sighting
operations.description: Creates a sighting in the EclecticIQ Platform based on the title, observable type, confidence value and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Sighting Title
parameters.name: sighting_title
parameters.description: Title of the sighting that you want to create in the EclecticIQ platform.

parameters.title: Sighting Description
parameters.name: sighting_description
parameters.description: (Optional) Description of the sighting that you want to create in the EclecticIQ platform.

parameters.title: Observable Value
parameters.name: observable_value
parameters.description: Specify the Observable value of the sighting that you want to create in the EclecticIQ platform.

parameters.title: Observable type
parameters.name: observable_type
parameters.description: Select the observable type of the sighting that you want to create in the EclecticIQ platform. You can choose from options such as: domain, email, host, ipv6, mutex, etc.

parameters.title: Observable maliciousness
parameters.name: observable_maliciousness
parameters.description: Select the observable maliciousness value of the sighting that you want to create in the EclecticIQ platform. You can choose from options such as: Unknown, Safe, Malicious (High confidence), Malicious (Medium confidence), or Malicious (Low confidence)

parameters.title: Confidence value
parameters.name: confidence_value
parameters.description: Select the confidence value of the sighting that you want to create in the EclecticIQ platform. You can choose from the following options: No Confidence, Unknown, Low, Medium, or High.

parameters.title: Impact value
parameters.name: impact_value
parameters.description: Select the impact value of the sighting that you want to create in the EclecticIQ platform. You can choose from the following options: No Impact, Unknown, Low, Medium, or High.

parameters.title: Sighting Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags that you want to associate with the sighting that you want to create in the EclecticIQ platform. Each tag is delimited by ','.
